text: Hello Guian. Just wanted to check in and see how you're doing. Are you studying at home?  How are you finding it?  Are the Uni providing online work/tutorials.  I assume you might be on Easter break now.  Hope it's all going OK. Very different way of working to get used to.  Hope you and your family are well. Lucy :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi Lucy I am well and so are my family and friends. My uni is providing online lecture/workshops and they have just extended the deadlines. It is a bit difficult but it's not that bad. Thank you my family and I are well and I wish the same for yours too. :blush:

Oh that's good that they are still teaching online.  Nice too that they've given you a bit more time to adjust. Let me know if there's anything I can help you with. You probably know a lot of this already, but I thought some of this blog might be useful from my friend that looks after Education at Animated Women.  <https://www.animatedwomenuk.com/support-for-students-during-covid-19/>

attachments.title: Support for Students during COVID-19 - Animated Women UK
attachments.text: As a result of COVID-19 many students, who were looking forward to finishing their studies and celebrating graduation this year, are now faced with an uncertain future resulting from university closures. Although academic institutions are now adapting to support their students through distance learning and online feedback, the reality is many individuals have lost accessâ€¦
